title: Law establishing Rwanda Meteorology Agency Meteo Rwanda) and Determining its Mission, Organisation and Functioning
title_en: Law establishing Rwanda Meteorology Agency Meteo Rwanda) and Determining its Mission, Organisation and Functioning

provisions.title: Article 1 - Ratification
provisions.content: The Financing Agreement signed in Kigali, Rwanda on 29 September 2011, between Republic of Rwanda and the International Agricultural Development Fund (IFAD), relating to the loan of eleven million six hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 11,600,000) and grant of eleven million six hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 11,600,000) for Project for Rural Income through Exports, is hereby ratified and becomes fully effective.

provisions.title: Article 2 - Authorities responsible for the
provisions.content: implementation of this Order The Prime Minister, the Minister of Finance Economic Planning, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation and the Minister Agriculture and Animal Resources are entrusted with the implementation of this Order.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Order shall come into force on the date of publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda.
